item.title: Portfolio: 2 Columns
item.dc:creator: minti
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="standard_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="60"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

This is an example of a sortable, 2 Column Portfolio.

For each Portfolio Page you create (any number possible) you can set column count, pagination and item count, as well if its sortable or not. You can add Portfolio Grids to every Page you want or need, with the help of the fantastic and easy to use template builder that is built right into the theme.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" text_color="dark" text_align="left" bottom_padding="40"][vc_column width="1/1"][minti_portfolio style="default" columns="2" projects="24" overlay="icon" showfilter="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: minti
item.content:encoded: [vc_row type="standard_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="80" bottom_padding="80"][vc_column][minti_headline type="h2" align="align-center" font="font-special" transform="transform-uppercase" size="fontsize-m" weight="fontweight-700" margin="0 0 20px 0" lineheight="lh-inherit"]Grab attention and hold it[/minti_headline][minti_headline type="div" align="align-center" font="font-inherit" size="fontsize-m" weight="fontweight-inherit" color="#999999" margin="0" lineheight="lh-inherit" transform="transform-inherit"]Alert messages are a great way to grab attention and provide users with useful informations. Fringilla penatibus orci est non mollit, suspendisse pulvinar egestas a donec. Vulputate mi dui suscipit, molestie vulputate libero fusce iaculis suscipit. Sapien pede libero. Maecenas lacus aliquet et nisl nunc, per sed sed maecenas.Lectus tincidunt pellentesque augue urna sit sed, arcu sed ante ac montes pellentesque consectetuer, neque magnis penatibus laoreet vehicula nulla orci, a malesuada justo laoreet ipsum, in ac fusce.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="standard_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="80" bottom_padding="80"][vc_column width="1/1"][minti_headline type="h2" align="align-center" font="font-special" transform="transform-uppercase" size="fontsize-m" weight="fontweight-700" margin="0 0 20px 0" lineheight="lh-inherit"]Resize the Browser window and see the magic happen![/minti_headline][minti_headline type="div" align="align-center" font="font-inherit" size="fontsize-m" weight="fontweight-inherit" color="#999999" margin="0" lineheight="lh-inherit" transform="transform-inherit"]With our [visibility] Shortcode you can display different contents for the different devices seperatly. Just resize the Browser window and see different messages depending on the screensize.[/minti_headline][minti_divider style="1" margin="60px 0 60px 0"][vc_column_text][minti_visibility show="desktop"] [minti_alert type="warning" close="false"]This Message will only show up in - Desktop mode.[/minti_alert] [/minti_visibility]
[minti_visibility show="tablet"] [minti_alert type="success" close="false"]This Message will only show up in - Tablet mode.[/minti_alert] [/minti_visibility]
[minti_visibility show="mobile-landscape"] [minti_alert type="info" close="false"]This Message will only show up in - Mobile Landscape mode.[/minti_alert] [/minti_visibility]
[minti_visibility show="mobile-portrait"] [minti_alert type="error" close="false"]This Message will only show up in - Mobile Portrait mode.[/minti_alert] [/minti_visibility][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Portfolio: 4 Columns
item.dc:creator: minti
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="standard_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="60"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

This is an example of a sortable, 4 Column Portfolio.

For each Portfolio Page you create (any number possible) you can set column count, pagination and item count, as well if its sortable or not. You can add Portfolio Grids to every Page you want or need, with the help of the fantastic and easy to use template builder that is built right into the theme.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" text_color="dark" text_align="left" bottom_padding="40"][vc_column width="1/1"][minti_portfolio style="default" columns="4" projects="24" overlay="icon" showfilter="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Tooltips
item.dc:creator: minti
item.content:encoded: [vc_row type="standard_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="80" bottom_padding="80"][vc_column width="1/1"][minti_headline type="h2" align="align-center" font="font-special" transform="transform-uppercase" size="fontsize-m" weight="fontweight-700" margin="0 0 20px 0" lineheight="lh-inherit"]Add Tooltips for further explanations.[/minti_headline][minti_headline type="div" align="align-center" font="font-inherit" size="fontsize-m" weight="fontweight-inherit" color="#999999" margin="0" lineheight="lh-inherit" transform="transform-inherit"]Interfaces semantic; deliverables users, seamless beta-test implement tag, communities virtual, global, solutions synthesize blogospheres models partnerships innovate evolve channels, repurpose.[/minti_headline][minti_divider style="1" margin="60px 0 60px 0"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. [minti_tooltip text="Suspendisse et quam elit"]Phasellus vestibulum[/minti_tooltip] tempor lectus ultricies sagittis. Etiam scelerisque rhoncus nisi, nec viverra lorem tristique et. Fusce in diam sit amet enim fermentum euismod ac eu nisl. Curabitur erat eros, feugiat sit amet molestie sed, ornare eu neque. In orci quam, interdum eget commodo vel, accumsan at lorem. Nam a vehicula ipsum. [minti_tooltip text="Suspendisse et quam elit"]Nunc et iaculis[/minti_tooltip] lorem. Praesent nec tellus augue, mollis euismod turpis. item.title: Blank
item.dc:creator: minti
item.content:encoded: [vc_row type="standard_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" bg_color="#fafafa" text_color="dark" text_align="center" top_padding="100" bottom_padding="100"][vc_column][minti_headline type="h1" align="center" font="special" transform="uppercase" size="20px" weight="700" margin="0 0 20px 0"]Blank Page Template[/minti_headline][vc_column_text]Unicon includes a blank page template that allows you to build pages without header & footer. You can use all other functions, like the page builder, shortcodes & visual editor to have full control over your pages. This is perfect, for Maintanance Pages, Coming Soon Pages or to create unique Landing Pages to advertise your products.[minti_spacer height="10"][minti_button link="#" size="medium" target="_self" lightbox="false" color="color-3" icon="fa-reply"]Back to Theme Demo[/minti_button][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row type="standard_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" text_color="dark" text_align="left" top_padding="60" parallax_bg="" section_arrow="" video_bg="" enable_video_color_overlay=""][vc_column][vc_column_text]

This is an example of a sortable, Portfolio 3 Columns Grid.

For each Portfolio Page you create (any number possible) you can set column count, pagination and item count, as well if its sortable or not. You can add Portfolio Grids to every Page you want or need, with the help of the fantastic and easy to use template builder that is built right into the theme.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width_section" bg_position="left top" bg_repeat="stretch" text_color="dark" text_align="left" bottom_padding="40" parallax_bg="" section_arrow="" video_bg="" enable_video_color_overlay=""][vc_column width="1/1"][minti_portfolio style="grid" columns="3" projects="24" overlay="effect" showfilter="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Robin Shirt
item.dc:creator: minti
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo. NELLY.COM

Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Garbo
item.dc:creator: minti
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo. NELLY.COM
